title: Mega Game Music Bundle
description: MEGA Game Music Bundle Includes 640 Wav Files (8GB OF MUSIC)
longDescription:
Mega Game Music Bundle is an 8 GB music pack with 600+ tracks, covering various genres & themes, for royalty-free use in video games. The bundle contains up to 5 different versions for each track in WAV format for professional editing.


With 15 hours of tracks, including short & alternative versions, short & long loops, intros & stingers, you’ll have high-quality music for multiple projects!


For easier navigation, bundle content is organized into 20 themed folders:


  1. War & Battle Music - LISTEN
  2. Melancholic & Sad Music - LISTEN
  3. Happy & Joyful Music - LISTEN
  4. Peaceful & Relaxing Music - LISTEN
  5. Sci-Fi & Space Music - LISTEN
  6. Fight & Combat Music - LISTEN
  7. Adventure & Inspiration Music - LISTEN
  8. Holiday & Christmas Music - LISTEN
  9. Technology & Futuristic Music - LISTEN
  10. Quirky & Sneaky Music - LISTEN
  11. Acoustic Guitar Music - LISTEN
  12. Cartoon & Comedy Music - LISTEN
  13. Erotic & Sensual Music - LISTEN
  14. Funky & Groovy Music - LISTEN
  15. Mysterious & Mystical Music - LISTEN
  16. Dance & Electronic Music - LISTEN
  17. Scary & Spooky Music - LISTEN
  18. Energetic Rock Music - LISTEN
  19. Romantic & Sentimental Music - LISTEN
  20. Heroic & Glorious Music - LISTEN


You can also find some of these themes/products individually here: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/Composer+Squad


❮❮❮❮❮ HERE’S EVERYTHING YOU’RE GETTING WITH THIS BUNDLE ❯❯❯❯❯


  • 640 High-Quality Music Tracks
  • Including Full Tracks, Alt Versions, Loops, Intros & Stingers
  • 20 Different Game Music Themes
  • 15 Hours of Extraordinary Music
  • 8 GB of Music in 16-bit / 44.1 Khz WAV format
  • Commercial Rights & Royalty-Free License


❮❮❮❮❮ MUSIC FOR GAMES & VIDEOS ❯❯❯❯❯


Mega Game Music Bundle consists of the 20 most essential music themes with up to 5 different versions for each track that gives you all the music you need that can easily be paired with your game visuals, action scenes & storylines. The retail value of this collection, if tracks were licensed individually, is $9,000+. Bundled together, you can enjoy this massive collection for less than 1% of that cost!


❮❮❮❮❮ THE TRUTH IS ❯❯❯❯❯


For over 15 years while we, Composer Squad, have been producing music for films, TV shows, games & videos, we’ve noticed that many talented game developers struggled with finding quality music that would instantly elevate the quality of their games.


As creators, we understand the importance of having high-quality materials accessible for multiple projects with a tight budget. That’s why we’ve created the Mega Game Music Bundle so you’ll have professionally mixed & mastered tracks with different versions. Plus, you can use the music over and over, not only in-game but in video production as well, without any additional fees or royalties.


❮❮❮❮❮ YOUTUBE POLICY ❯❯❯❯❯


Our music is registered in YouTube's Content ID system to prevent unauthorized usage & piracy. Although Unreal Engine Marketplace EULA does not include YouTube monetization, we are offering free whitelisting for our customers. If you have purchased this pack and want to monetize your own promotional videos on YouTube, please contact us at: whitelisting@composersquad.com and we will whitelist your video/channel in the Content ID system. Please note that this doesn’t extend to third parties monetizing videos on YouTube.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 640

Number of Audio Cues: 640

Sample rate / bit rate: 16 Bit, 44,100 Hz
